alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 22 at 3:29AM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Sumter, Coastal Levy, Coastal Citrus, Coastal Hernando, Inland Levy, Inland Citrus, Inland Hernando and Inland Pasco Counties. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Sumter
